TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegisteredScript extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to a client script that was previously registered with the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A client script is uniquely identified by its key and its type. Only one script with a given key/type pair can be registered with a page.
Client scripts are not guaranteed to be output in the order that they are registered in.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the script block should be rendered on the Web page enclosed in tags.
Docs.value: if the script should be rendered on the Web page enclosed in tags; otherwise, .
Docs.returns: if the script should be rendered on the Web page enclosed in tags; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the control that registered the script.
Docs.value: A reference to the control that registered the script.
Docs.returns: A reference to the control that registered the script.

Docs.summary: Gets the key that, together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.RegisteredScript.Type%2A> value, identifies the script.
Docs.value: The value of the key. This value can be or empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A client script is uniquely identified by its key and its type. Only one script with a given key/type pair can be registered with a page.

Docs.returns: The value of the key. This value can be or empty.

Docs.summary: Gets the file name of the script.
Docs.value: The file name of the script. This value can be or empty.
Docs.returns: The file name of the script. This value can be or empty.

Docs.summary: Gets the script type that indicates when the script is intended to be executed.
Docs.value: A value defined by the enumeration.
Docs.returns: A value defined by the enumeration.

Docs.summary: Gets the client script type that, together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.RegisteredScript.Key%2A> value, identifies the script.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is usually specified by using the type of the control that registered the script.
A client script is uniquely identified by its key and its type. Only one script with a given key/type pair can be registered with a page.

Docs.summary: Gets the URL of the script file.
Docs.value: The URL of the script file. This value can be or empty.
Docs.returns: The URL of the script file. This value can be or empty.
